name: Genre Manager
overview: Automatically display movie genres on the home page as Netflix-style horizontal rows
description: A Jellyfin plugin that automatically displays movie genres on the home page as Netflix-style horizontal rows. Features automatic genre detection from your Jellyfin library, configurable genre selection and priority, support for movies and/or TV series, responsive design with hover effects, and easy navigation to genre pages.

versions.changelog: Major rewrite - File Transformation integration for automatic script injection, simplified configuration with static genre list, Netflix-style display using Jellyfin native API
Fix configuration page - Implement IHasWebPages with GetPages() method, use embedded resources directly without ConfigurationController
Fix installation error - Remove IHasWebPages interface incompatible with Jellyfin 10.8, keep ConfigurationController and embedded resources
Initial release - Netflix-style genre display with automatic detection, configurable selection and priority ordering, responsive design with horizontal scrolling
